statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); ccusage=$(ccusage blocks --json | jq -r '.blocks[] | select(.isActive == true) | "\(if .totalTokens >= 1000000 then (.totalTokens / 1000000 * 100 | round) / 100 | tostring + "M" elif .totalTokens >= 1000 then (.totalTokens / 1000 * 100 | round) / 100 | tostring + "K" else .totalTokens | tostring end) tokens | ğŸ“ˆ \(.totalTokens / 17700000 * 100 | floor)% ($\((.costUSD * 100 | round) / 100)) | â±ï¸ \(.projection.remainingMinutes / 60 | floor)h \(.projection.remainingMinutes % 60)m left | ğŸ”¥ $\((.burnRate.costPerHour * 100 | round) / 100)/hour"'); printf "%s | %s" "$model" "$ccusage"
